meanings.definition: A type of fish with long, whisker-like barbels around the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The goatfishes swam gracefully in the coral reef.
meanings.sent2: We saw a school of goatfishes while snorkeling.
meanings.sent3: The goatfishes seemed to be having a chat with the sea anemones.
meanings.sent4: The goatfishes moved through the water like elegant dancers.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the goatfishes made them stand out among the other fish.

meanings.definition: The plural form of goatfish, referring to multiple fish of this species.
meanings.sent1: The goatfishes were a sight to behold as they swam together.
meanings.sent2: Divers often encounter goatfishes in tropical waters.
meanings.sent3: The goatfishes decided to throw a party at the underwater cave.
meanings.sent4: The goatfishes moved in unison, creating a mesmerizing underwater ballet.
meanings.sent5: The glimmering scales of the goatfishes caught the sunlight, creating a beautiful spectacle.
